prime.utils.Color

type
class
available in
swf

Static Variables

BLACK(inline,null) : Int

WHITE(inline,null) : Int

Static Methods

inline alphaBlend(v : prime.types.RGBA, alpha : Float) : prime.types.RGBA

Blends a RGBA color together with the given alpha. The returned RGBA value has an alpha of 100%

inline alphaBlendColors(v1 : prime.types.RGBA, v2 : prime.types.RGBA, alpha : Float) : prime.types.RGBA

Blends two RGBA colors together with the given alpha. The returned RGBA value has an alpha of 100%

inline argb(rgba : prime.types.RGBA) : UInt

Creates a ARGB color from a RGBA value

inline argbToRgba(argb : UInt) : prime.types.RGBA

Creates a RGBA color from a ARGB value

inline blend(v1 : prime.types.RGBA, v2 : prime.types.RGBA) : prime.types.RGBA

Blends to RGBA colors together.

inline create(?r : UInt, ?g : UInt, ?b : UInt, ?a : UInt) : prime.types.RGBA

Creates a RGBA object from single color values.

inline gray(v : UInt) : prime.types.RGBA

Creates a RGBA object containing gray values.

inline random() : prime.types.RGBA

Returns a random color with an alpha value that is always 0xFF

inline rgbToRgba(rgb : UInt) : prime.types.RGBA

Creates a RGBA color from a rgb value

inline validate(v : prime.types.RGBA) : UInt

Makes sure that the given color is between BLACK and WHITE

inline validate24Bit(v : UInt) : UInt

inline validate8Bit(v : UInt) : UInt
